hero.description: I transform your ideas into exceptional digital experiences

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Senior Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience creating innovative web solutions

intro.title: Web Development Expert since 2011
paragraphs: With over 13 years of experience in web development, I've evolved from frontend to full stack, mastering the most modern technologies. My journey has allowed me to work on varied projects, from e-commerce to complex enterprise applications.

Based in Tournai with international experience (Lille, Brussels), I combine deep technical expertise with creative vision. Specialized in React, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL, I create robust and scalable solutions that meet the most demanding business needs.
My goal? Put my expertise at the service of your projects to create performant, elegant, and sustainable web applications that propel your business into the digital era.

timeline.title: Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: Development of complex web applications and custom websites for various clients. Expertise in React, TypeScript, Node.js and Firebase. End-to-end project management.

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.description: E-commerce website development and maintenance. User experience optimization and new features integration. Performance and SEO improvements.

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Mockup integration and web interface development. Learning best practices and modern technologies. Participation in various client projects.

timeline.title: Backend Developer
timeline.description: Qualifying training at the Eurometropolitan E-Campus in Tournai

timeline.title: Web Developer Degree
timeline.description: Professional training program focused on the design, development, maintenance, and evolution of static and dynamic web applications. Mastery of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, and CMS. Skills in database management, security, cross-browser compatibility, SEO, and deployment. Use of frameworks, teamwork, participation in project specifications, and continuous technological monitoring. Modules included programming, design, project management, and internships.

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide my work

items.title: Clean Code
items.description: Writing maintainable, readable, and optimized code. Every line matters in creating sustainable applications.

items.title: Elegant Design
items.description: Creating interfaces that combine beauty and functionality. User experience is at the heart of every decision.

items.title: Optimal Performance
items.description: Optimizing every aspect for fast and responsive applications. Speed is crucial for engagement.

cleanCode.title: Clean & Maintainable Code
cleanCode.description: I prioritize structured, documented, and tested code to facilitate project evolution and maintenance.

modernDesign.title: Modern & Responsive Design
modernDesign.description: Creating elegant interfaces with Figma, optimized for all devices and focused on user experience.

performance.title: Optimized Performance
performance.description: Fast and fluid applications through code optimization and efficient deployment.

userFocused.title: User-Centered
userFocused.description: Development oriented towards real user needs to create intuitive and effective solutions.
